ctu_text: \n", "briefDescription": "The scheme \"Goa State Best Library and Best Librarian Award\" has been designed to envisage grant of awards for one meritorious Library and one Librarian serving either in any Government or Government\u2013aided Libraries in the State of Goa, which includes the Public/Academic/Special/Research Libraries. ", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The scheme \"Goa State Best Library and Best Librarian Award\" has been designed by the Directorate of Art and Culture, Government of Goa envisaging grant of awards for one meritorious Library and one Librarian serving either in any Government or Government\u2013aided Libraries in the State of Goa, which include the Public/Academic/Special/Research Libraries every year. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "block_quote", "children": [{"text": "Objective", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "To recognize the hard work put in by the management of the Libraries and the Librarians and to give an impetus and encouragement to them by conferring awards on them for their contribution in the field of library movement. "}]}], "benefitTypes": {"id": 3, "value": "composite", "label": "Composite"}, "benefits": [{"type": "block_quote", "children": [{"text": "Nature and Quantum of Assistance", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Goa State Best Library Award", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "A cash prize of \u20b9 50,000/-, a Memento, a Citation and a Certificate.
